G

Game - Class in org.projectsw.Model
The class contains information about the game state, including the board, players (with info on the currently playing one and the first one), chat, and common goals.
Game() - Constructor for class org.projectsw.Model.Game
Creates a new instance of a SILLY Game, with a new chat, an empty player list, a full-unused board and an empty commonGals list.
GameCreatedMessageFrame - Class in org.projectsw.View.GraphicalUI.MessagesGUI

Groups - Class in org.projectsw.Model.CommonGoal
The Groups class represents a game strategy where the goal is to have a certain number of groups of tiles on the bookshelf.
Groups(Integer) - Constructor for class org.projectsw.Model.CommonGoal.Groups
Creates a new instance of the Groups class using the unique code of the CommonGoal.
